MCK.NZ.long_name: Millennium & Copthorne Hotels New Zealand Limited
MCK.NZ.summary: Millennium & Copthorne Hotels New Zealand Limited owns, operates, manages, leases, and franchises hotels in New Zealand and Australia. It is also involved in the ownership of residential apartments; investment and development properties; and development and sale of residential and commercial properties. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand. Millennium & Copthorne Hotels New Zealand Limited is a subsidiary of CDL Hotels Holdings New Zealand Limited.
